description.value:
Spells without compendium links set up are still undergoing approval

Clerics of the Dragon Dominion learn the following spells once able to cast spells of that level.  These spells are always prepared and don’t count against your prepared spell amount.  

If a dominion spell is not listed as a Cleric spell, it nonetheless counts as a Cleric spell for you.  

Dragon Dominion Spells

Able to Cast

Dominion Spells

1st Level Cleric Spells

@Compendium[undertaking.spells-level-1.DR1S6TA7ZZHXVKVY]{Menacing Visage}, and the additional spell of your Elemental Affinity.

2nd Level Cleric Spells

@Compendium[undertaking.spells-level-2.H12OZBL02CSFQX6L]{Dragon’s Breath}, and the additional spell of your Elemental Affinity.

3rd Level Cleric Spells

Sprout Wings*, and the additional spell of your Elemental Affinity.

4th Level Cleric Spells

@Compendium[undertaking.spells-level-4.YL8USCAX1ZTDKOA1]{Shapeshift}, and the additional spell of your Elemental Affinity.

5th Level Cleric Spells

@Compendium[undertaking.spells-level-5.IGNKJCNA0BXYD1OT]{Unnatural Recovery}, and the additional spell of your Elemental Affinity.
